text: Ormuri () is an East Iranian language spoken in the city of Kaniguram in Pakistan. It may also be spoken by a few people in Logar, Afghanistan. It is notable for its unusual sound inventory. This includes a voiceless alveolar trill and voiced and unvoiced alveolo-palatal fricatives. ==References== Category:Languages of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Category:Languages of Afghanistan Category:Iranian languages
title: Ormuri
